  • Enhancing existing solutions and approaches by promoting new methodology and best practices in data science field
  • Providing subject matter expertise and quality assurance of complex data science projects
  • Automating processes/codes
  • Familiarising yourself with new tools/software/techniques

Qualifications

What we’re after…

  • Graduate/Post Graduate degree (Masters or Ph.D.) in Quantitative field such as Statistics, Mathematics, Operational Research, Computer Science, Economics, or engineering or equivalent experience .
  • Graduating in 2025.
  • Results oriented with strong analytical, consultative and problem-solving skills, with demonstrated intellectual and analytical rigor
  • Familiarity with modern distributed systems, including both Hadoop/SQL/MLP and Apache Spark etc.
  • Familiarity with one or more data analytics/programming tools such as R or Python
  • Knowledge of applying predictive modelling and machine learning technique to problems
  • Ability to communicate with impact and interest in working in a consulting-like environment and client-facing project roles

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

Title: Data Scientist (Analytics), Consumer
Description:
Job Description

About the Consumer Group

As the name Consumer Group implies, this group is responsible for building and developing Wolt’s consumer-facing products. The core mission is to master the user experience while scaling up the platform to enable delivering a mall in a pocket.

About The Consumer Data Science Team

Consumer Analytics team comprises a cross-section of Data Scientists (Analytics) and Analytics Engineers. We work closely with the Data Engineering team who help ensure we have the right platform to deliver our insights at scale. We partner with Product, Engineering, Design and Operations teams to guide measurement and tactical decision-making using advanced analytics as we expand the Wolt platform across the globe.

About The Role

As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational and actionable data-driven experience that requires a good mix of technical and stakeholder engagement skills. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics or data science role. Data Scientists at Wolt take ownership of the business outcomes.

If you enjoy finding patterns amidst the chaos, are excited to build from 0 to 1, and have experience using data science skills to solve business problems, we're looking for someone like you.

Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland and Sweden. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


Our humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in a Data Analytics or Data Science position.
Expertise in statistical analysis, including hypothesis testing, experimentation using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent for product development (preferably consumer-facing).
Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Looker, Tableau, Mixpanel, or similar.
Relentless pursuit of new ideas and data sources, and have the ability to systematically tackle ambiguous problems with a data-driven, hypothesis-based approach


Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

About Wolt

Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.

Working in Product Development at Wolt

At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.

The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.

Join us today to build Wolt together!

Title: Data Scientist (Analytics), Support, Workforce Management
Description:
Job Description

About the Support Group

As the name Support Group implies, this group is responsible for the core part of the customer experience journey that has got Wolt top-notch ratings in app stores.

During the years we’ve invested a lot in the in-house built support tooling as we believe that it’s the only way we can ensure the satisfaction of all of our customers and partners in each of the 25 countries that we operate in. We take huge pride in our customer operations’ quality, so on top of building delightful support experiences in our consumer app we also want to proactively identify and solve issues even before our customers and partners even notice something might be wrong.

About The Support Analytics Team

Our Support Analytics team’s main goal is to deliver an amazing Customer, Merchants & Courier support experience while optimizing our operations by providing actionable insights and quantifying the impact of those actions on the overall business. 💡

You’ll be part of this team working with top Data Science and Analytics Engineering professionals.

About The Role

As a Data Scientist at Wolt, your role involves diving into our data to solve crucial business problems. The scope of this role ranges from diagnosing problem areas to identifying solutions to designing experiments and ultimately influencing decision-making. This is a rare, operational, and actionable data-driven experience. When you join this team, you will be driving action from the frontlines, rather than just doing yet another analytics role.

Your job will mainly focus on driving operational efficiency with the Workforce Management (WFM) team and optimizing resource allocation by creating accurate scheduling and intraday forecasts, simplifying forecasting processes, building and supporting KPI dashboards, conducting root cause analysis for SLA improvements, exploring cost optimization opportunities, managing the capacity plan framework, enhancing the WFM data pipeline, and uncovering data-driven insights to refine planning, scheduling, reporting, and intraday management.

You're Excited About This Opportunity Because You Can…


Passionately leverage your analytical skill sets to tell the story about business performance and align executives around what matters and why.
Collaborate with senior stakeholders across Finance, Product, Analytics, and Support Operations, including country and regional heads of support and the overall head of Customer Service, to influence our operating model and how we structure our queues to provide the best support for our customers
Develop and automate forecasting models to plan the capacity of the support centers across different locations.
Maintain and improve efficiency metrics. You will track scheduling efficiency, occupancy rates, and other key performance indicators and advise on what we can do to improve
Create metrics and build data pipelines, transforming data into valuable information to be used in critical decision-making.
Use advanced analytics & statistical analysis to accelerate decision-making and build heuristics to quantify the impact of those decisions.
Work backward from understanding and sizing problems to ideating solutions.


Our offering to you


The online delivery platform that Wolt is building will offer you interesting and complex challenges together with the opportunities to create a big impact with your skills. Lots of geolocational and temporal data in real-time combined with differences in the economics and dynamics of the cities we operate in make Wolt both a challenging and so interesting company to practice analytics.
You can choose the location from our tech hubs Helsinki, Berlin and Stockholm, or you can work entirely remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden and Estonia. You have the chance to decide the ways of working — a hybrid, at the office, or remote within the location above. 💙 Read more about our remote setup.
You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


Our humble expectations


Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics position within an industry or research setting.
Expertise in statistical analysis, using statistical software packages in Python, R, or equivalent.
Exceptional communications skills, with the ability to influence and advise senior stakeholders through telling exciting and valuable stories from any data exploration
Proficiency in writing structured and efficient SQL queries for large data sets.
Have prior experience building forecasting models & time series analysis (Prophet, SARIMA, Holt-Winters or similar).
Have prior experience building intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that influence business decisions, utilizing tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.
Comfortable with building data pipelines using Airflow or similar tools.
Previous experience in Cost Analysis, What-if Scenario Analysis, Capacity planning, and Workforce Management is nice to have but not mandatory.


Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Zhanna Filintseva (zhanna.filintseva@wolt.com)

About Wolt

Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.

The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. Title: Data Scientist/Analyst - Product Analytics
Description:
Vår vision är att skapa en bättre framtid för miljoner människor. För att lyckas i det arbetet behöver vi skapa förståelse och insikter om våra kunders beteenden. Låter det kul att skapa den förståelsen genom datadriven analys? Vill du dessutom bli del av ett drivet och engagerat analysteam som lägger stor vikt vid ödmjukhet, sammanhållning och att ha kul tillsammans? Läs vidare!

Om rollen

Vi söker dig som vill jobba med Data Science och analys, och lockas av att arbeta datadrivet. Som Data Scientist/Analytiker hos oss jobbar du nära utvecklingsteamen med analyser, insikter och uppföljningar av produkter, funktioner och mycket annat. Parallellt stöttar du övriga delar av Avanza kring affärs- och datarelaterade frågor.

Du kommer även ha ansvar för större, teamöverskridande projekt där djupare insikter och modellering av kundbeteende kan hjälpa oss att ta nästa steg i att förstå hur vi bäst hjälper våra kunder och följer upp på våra mål. Det genomgående fokuset är att analysera våra produkter, vår affär och våra kunder och dela dessa insikter för att hjälpa Avanza att fatta bättre beslut.

Du kommer ingå i vår centrala analysarea som består av 7 personer. I gruppen finns kollegor med olika spetskompetenser som gör att vi kompletterar varandra och tillsammans kan stötta hela Avanza med analyser och insikter.

I Rollen Ingår Att


Stötta utvecklingsteamen med datahantering, analys och beslutsunderlag i deras löpande arbete och driva på för ett mer datadrivet arbetssätt
Utvärdera samt följa upp nya produkter, funktioner och kampanjer
Utveckla statistiska-/ML-modeller som kan hjälpa oss förstå vår affär och våra kunder bättre.
Sprida insikter och statistik vidare i organisationen
Delta i att bygga upp en analysmiljö på Avanza avseende såväl data som metodik
Utbilda, inspirera och dela med dig av din kunskap både inom gruppen och inom Avanza i stort


Om dig

I den här rollen får du stor möjlighet och uppmuntran att utvecklas i din roll och inom ditt specialistområde, så vi tror med fördel att du är nyfiken!

Dessutom Tror Vi Att Du Har


Universitetsutbildning inom matematik, statistik, datavetenskap alternativt motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
Har erfarenhet av att jobba i BI-system
Har god erfarenhet av kund- och affärsanalys
Har erfarenhet av SQL/BigQuery, samt statistisk-/ML-modellering med hjälp av Python och Notebooks.


Meriterande


Har erfarenhet av att visualisera statistik, tex i form av dashboards eller i presentationer
Är trygg med att hålla presentationer och dragningar för både team och större grupper


För Att Lyckas i Den Här Rollen Är Du Inte Bara Skicklig Inom Ditt Specialistområde Utan Vi Tror Även Att Du Matchar In På De Personliga Egenskaper Vi Söker

I denna roll söker vi en person som värdesätter samarbete och bidrar till att skapa en positiv och givande arbetsmiljö för sina kollegor. Du är snabbtänkt, nyfiken och har en stark vilja att lära dig nya saker och metoder. Du tar dig an komplexa uppgifter med självförtroende och har en förmåga att snabbt anpassa dig till förändringar och utveckla nya färdigheter.

Som en aktiv deltagare i diskussioner och en tydlig kommunikatör, hjälper du teamet och andra samarbetspartners att nå beslut. Du är noggrann, resultatinriktad och van vid att sätta upp och följa mål både för dig själv och för projektet.

Ansökan

Skicka din ansökan genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök nu” under annonsen. Skicka gärna din ansökan snarast då urvalet sker löpande, dock senast den 20 Oktober. Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl p.g.a. GDPR. Välkommen med din ansökan!

Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag/annonssäljare undanbedes.

/

Du kommer även ha ansvar för större, teamöverskridande projekt där djupare insikter och modellering av kundbeteende kan hjälpa oss att ta nästa steg i att förstå hur vi bäst hjälper våra kunder och följer upp på våra mål. Det genomgående fokuset är att analysera våra produkter, vår affär och våra kunder och dela dessa insikter för att hjälpa Avanza att fatta bättre beslut.

Du kommer ingå i vår centrala analysarea som består av 7 personer. I gruppen finns kollegor med olika spetskompetenser som gör att vi kompletterar varandra och tillsammans kan stötta hela Avanza med analyser och insikter.

I Rollen Ingår Att

  • Stötta utvecklingsteamen med datahantering, analys och beslutsunderlag i deras löpande arbete och driva på för ett mer datadrivet arbetssätt
  • Utvärdera samt följa upp nya produkter, funktioner och kampanjer
  • Utveckla statistiska-/ML-modeller som kan hjälpa oss förstå vår affär och våra kunder bättre.
  • Sprida insikter och statistik vidare i organisationen
  • Delta i att bygga upp en analysmiljö på Avanza avseende såväl data som metodik
  • Utbilda, inspirera och dela med dig av din kunskap både inom gruppen och inom Avanza i stort

Om dig

I den här rollen får du stor möjlighet och uppmuntran att utvecklas i din roll och inom ditt specialistområde, så vi tror med fördel att du är nyfiken!

Dessutom Tror Vi Att Du Har

  • Universitetsutbildning inom matematik, statistik, datavetenskap alternativt motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
  • Har erfarenhet av att jobba i BI-system
  • Har god erfarenhet av kund- och affärsanalys
  • Har erfarenhet av SQL/BigQuery, samt statistisk-/ML-modellering med hjälp av Python och Notebooks.

Meriterande

  • Har erfarenhet av att visualisera statistik, tex i form av dashboards eller i presentationer
  • Är trygg med att hålla presentationer och dragningar för både team och större grupper

För Att Lyckas i Den Här Rollen Är Du Inte Bara Skicklig Inom Ditt Specialistområde Utan Vi Tror Även Att Du Matchar In På De Personliga Egenskaper Vi Söker

I denna roll söker vi en person som värdesätter samarbete och bidrar till att skapa en positiv och givande arbetsmiljö för sina kollegor. Du är snabbtänkt, nyfiken och har en stark vilja att lära dig nya saker och metoder. Du tar dig an komplexa uppgifter med självförtroende och har en förmåga att snabbt anpassa dig till förändringar och utveckla nya färdigheter.

Som en aktiv deltagare i diskussioner och en tydlig kommunikatör, hjälper du teamet och andra samarbetspartners att nå beslut. Du är noggrann, resultatinriktad och van vid att sätta upp och följa mål både för dig själv och för projektet.

Ansökan

Skicka din ansökan genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök nu” under annonsen. Skicka gärna din ansökan snarast då urvalet sker löpande, dock senast den 20 Oktober. Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl p.g.a. GDPR. Välkommen med din ansökan!

Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag/annonssäljare undanbedes.

Title: Machine learning Engineer
Description:
We in the Machine Learning product area in the Activation, Retention, Conversion studio are focused on building robust and scalable machine learning solutions that can personalize activation, retention and conversion funnels to improve important business metrics like SUBS and MAU.

Through our messaging platform as well as other discovery & conversion surfaces, we communicate with users to connect them with valuable audio content and to help the business grow.

Our vision is to build the machine learning models and infrastructure that offers a fully personalized and ML-optimized experience for listeners throughout their user journey that powers every messaging and conversion campaign.

This role sits in a squad called White Mouse that owns the optimization of plan upsell targeting across the company. Our key problem areas are: What plan should the user be upsold on discovery surfaces? How should we communicate the user on consideration surfaces? How should we balance upselling plans vs other paid products? We are also working on projects around ad load optimization.

What you’ll do


Contribute to designing, building, evaluating, shipping, and refining the company’s product by hands-on ML development
Collaborate with a multi-functional agile team spanning user research, design, data science, product management, and engineering to build new product features that advance our mission to connect artists and fans in personalized and relevant ways
Prototype new approaches and productionize solutions at scale for our hundreds of millions of active users
Help drive optimisation, testing, and tooling to improve quality
Be part of an active group of machine learning practitioners in your mission and across the company Who you are
You have a strong background in machine learning, theory, and practice -You are comfortable explaining the intuition and assumptions behind ML concepts
You have hands-on experience implementing and maintaining production ML systems in Python, Scala, or similar languages
Experience with TensorFlow is also a plus
You are experienced with building data pipelines, and you are self-sufficient in getting the data you need to build and evaluate your models
You preferably have experience with cloud platforms like GCP or AWS
You care about agile software processes, data development, reliability, and focused experimentation
You have a desire to drive business impact


Start Date: 2024-11-25

End Date: 2025-11-25

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Grow with us

About this opportunity:

Within the GAIA, there is a unit for AI infrastructure and platform, with a team based in Sweden. GAIA Infrastructure is developing AI/ML components and systems, partly based on third party components and open source, to be integrated into Ericsson product and services. These components are enabling the entire life-cycle management of AI/ML, ensuring security, performance, scalability, and reliability.

Ericsson Language Intelligence (ELI) Platform unit is a dynamic team dedicated to leveraging the potential of Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs) to revolutionize the telecommunications sector. ELI's focus is on developing telecom domain-specific language models and benchmark datasets tailored for Ericsson's operational landscape. By strategically aligning these model services with various applications, ELI aims to enhance in-domain performance, streamline operational efficiency, and address critical factors such as accuracy, security, privacy, intellectual property rights, and reliability. We are seeking individuals who are passionate about telecom domain adaptation of LLM and generative AI. If you are excited about shaping the future of telecommunications through cutting-edge language models, we invite you to join us in this transformative journey.

We are now looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our GAIA ELI Platform in Stockholm, reporting to Head of GAIA ELI Platform research and development team. As a Data Scientist, you will play a pivotal role in advancing our generative AI platform, leveraging your expertise in machine learning, natural language processing, and telecom domain expertise to improve our models and deliver cutting-edge solutions to our internal and external customers.

What you will do:


Design and implement natural language processing algorithms and machine learning models to develop and optimize language models for the ELI platform. 
Perform data preprocessing, cleaning, and feature engineering to prepare large volumes of text data for training and inference. 
Evaluate model performance using appropriate metrics and iterate on model architecture and hyperparameters to improve accuracy and efficiency. 
Design and implement scalable, efficient systems for deploying and serving language models via web services or APIs. 
Understanding telecom domain and use cases 


The skills you bring:


Proven experience in developing and deploying language models, such as transformer-based architectures (e.g., BERT, GPT, etc.). 
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, with experience in data manipulation, model training, and software development. 
Strong understanding of NLP techniques, including text preprocessing, tokenization, part-of-speech tagging, named entity recognition, and sentiment analysis. 
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn) and proficiency in model evaluation and optimization. 
Solid understanding of data engineering principles, including data preprocessing, cleaning, and feature engineering for text data. In addition, it is beneficial that you have one or many of the following experiences:
Experience working with stakeholders and internal customers across a broad product and services portfolio, including building communities and alignment, requirement, and roadmap definitions
Experiences in Agile / Scrum development
Background with open-source software ecosystems and impacts on product strategy


Why join Ericsson?

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

What happens once you apply?

Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

Primary country and city: Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

Req ID: 750952

Title: ML Engineer
Description:
Are you passionate about building Machine Learning models that scale and drive real-world impact? Join Hemnet's Data & ML Platform team and help shape the future of ML-driven solutions in Sweden's leading property marketplace!




About the role

As an ML Engineer at Hemnet, you will be a key part of our Data & ML Platform team, working alongside skilled engineers to develop, deploy, and maintain Machine Learning models that power our products. You will play a vital role in enhancing user experiences by leveraging your expertise in ML, collaborating closely with Product Development, and ensuring high-quality, scalable ML solutions for our systems.




What you will do




Collaborate with Product Development teams to deliver ML-enhanced use cases and product features.
Take ownership of the entire ML model lifecycle, from experimentation and training to deployment, monitoring, and re-training.
Design and develop ML models for large-scale, publicly available systems with high demands on performance, availability, and frequent updates.
Contribute to the improvement of MLOps processes and work on infrastructure that supports robust model deployment.




What you bring




Required skills:




Coding background with proficiency in Python.
Experience in developing ML models for products deployed in high traffic systems.
Used to working with PR-based workflows or similar, including code reviews, automated testing, and CI/CD pipelines.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate ML features into products.




Bonus skills (meritorious):

We value experience from a Data Engineer or Data Scientist role in a mid-sized tech company. If you have experience from the property industry as well, we considerconsidere that a plus. Also, we’d be happy if you have experience with some or all of the technologies we’re using, or exploring:




BigQuery, GCP, and Vertex AI.
AWS, IaC (Terraform), and CI/CD.
LLMs, RAG, and vector databases.




Soft skills we value




Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Self-sufficiency: Ability to work independently, take initiative, and manage your own work.
Curiosity: Eagerness to explore new technologies and propose innovative solutions.
Collaboration: Excellent team collaboration skills with both internal teams and external stakeholders.
Risk-taking: A willingness to experiment and accept occasional failure to drive innovation.




Why Hemnet?




Opportunity to work on cutting-edge ML models that have a direct impact on user experience.
A collaborative and supportive team environment where innovation is encouraged.
Flexible working conditions, with the ability to work from the office 2 days a week and remotely the rest of the time.
Be part of a mission-driven company that’s shaping the future of property marketplaces in Sweden.




Hybrid work culture

Our Stockholm office is the hub of our collaboration and culture. With 150 team members, we value in-person connections and encourage regular office attendance, but of course with flexibility to work from home. To be part of our team, living in or near Stockholm is essential.




What we offer

At Hemnet we have a culture of sharing which includes lab weeks twice a year, regular demos, dev brekkies, and brown bags. Hemnet is a place where you can be yourself and have fun with others. We actively encourage you to explore and share your other passions – whether it's producing music, painting, or playing with clay.




Enjoy 30 days of holiday, plus 4 extra leave days (“YOLO days”), paid workouts and running classes/races. We provide comprehensive benefits to ensure you feel safe and supported, including pension benefits, parental leave top-up, and health insurance. Here’s our full benefit package 👈.




Ready to join us?

We look forward to your application! Please answer the questions below and submit your CV and we will get back to you as soon as possible. We’re reviewing applications as they come in, so don’t wait too long!




Deadline: October 18th

Title: Machine Learning engineer
Description:
Job Description

The primary tasks as a Machine Learning Engineer are:


Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usage and scale out to the comprehensive fashion network of the company.
Design, develop and maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.
Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.
Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, A/B test, etc.
Work in cross-functional agile team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, business stakeholders to build the AI ecosystem within the company.


Required skills and experiences:


Have a BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Have 4+ years professional experience working in relevant role(s) for a Machine Learning Engineer.
A hands-on person who loves coding, and like applying software engineering practices to machine learning projects.
Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production.
Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 3+ years.
Have great experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud.
Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, and deploying ML applications to production.
Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.
Have experience handling high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream) and a solid understanding of data structures, databases, and data storage technologies.
Familiar with agile ways of working team collaboration, data-driven development, reliable and responsible experimentation.


Remote: 50%

Assignment Period: 2024.10.21 - 2025.03.31

Submission deadline: 2024-10-20

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Webstep AB, som är en del av B3-koncernen, är bland annat unika genom vår expertis inom AI-tillämpningar och förmåga att leverera projekt till våra kunder. Vi kombinerar teknik och affärsbehov, och tar ansvar för hela projektcykeln – från business case till implementering av AI-lösningar.



Om rollen
Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet inom maskininlärning! Att vara anställd på Webstep AB innebär att du hjälper våra kunder i deras utvecklingsprojekt och dagliga utmaningar. Vi ser gärna att du har vana att arbeta såväl självständigt som kundnära och är van vid ett agilt teambaserat arbetssätt.




Vi letar efter dig som har:

Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetserfarenhet inom maskininlärning eller liknande område
Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
Gedigen erfarenhet inom minst ett programmeringsspråk (te.x. Python, Scala eller R)
Erfarenhet av SQL och databashantering
Erfarenhet av dataanalys- och visualiseringsverktyg så som Pandas, Matplotlib
Kunskap om maskininlärningsbibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Behärskar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift




Vad vi erbjuder:

Att vi trivs tillsammans på Webstep är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på kompetensutveckling, där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat: 

Generös kompetensutveckling
Attraktiv lönemodell
En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning



Om B3
Webstep AB är en del av B3-koncernen. B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.




Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!




Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Petra, för denna tjänst på petra.magnusson@b3.se

Show more

  • Behärskar god svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


Vad vi erbjuder:

Att vi trivs tillsammans på Webstep är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på kompetensutveckling, där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat: 

  • Generös kompetensutveckling
  • Attraktiv lönemodell
  • En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning


Om B3
Webstep AB är en del av B3-koncernen. B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!


Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig, Petra, för denna tjänst på petra.magnusson@b3.se

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
We in the Machine Learning product area in the Activation, Retention, Conversion studio are focused on building robust and scalable machine learning solutions that can personalize activation, retention and conversion funnels to improve important business metrics like SUBS and MAU. Through our messaging platform as well as other discovery & conversion surfaces, we communicate with users to connect them with valuable audio content and to help the business grow.

Our vision is to build the machine learning models and infrastructure that offers a fully personalized and ML-optimized experience for listeners throughout their user journey that powers every messaging and conversion campaign at Spotify.

This role sits in a squad called White Mouse that owns the optimization of plan upsell targeting across Spotify. Our key problem areas are: What plan should the user be upsold on discovery surfaces? How should we communicate the user on consideration surfaces? How should we balance upselling plans vs other paid products?

What You'll Do


Contribute to designing, building, evaluating, shipping, and refining Spotify’s product by hands-on ML development
Collaborate with a multi-functional agile team spanning user research, design, data science, product management, and engineering to build new product features that advance our mission to connect artists and fans in personalized and relevant ways
Prototype new approaches and productionize solutions at scale for our hundreds of millions of active users
Help drive optimisation, testing, and tooling to improve quality
Be part of an active group of machine learning practitioners in your mission and across Spotify


Who You Are


You have a strong background in machine learning, theory, and practice
You are comfortable explaining the intuition and assumptions behind ML concepts
You have hands-on experience implementing and maintaining production ML systems in Python, Scala, or similar languages
Experience with TensorFlow is also a plus
You are experienced with building data pipelines, and you are self-sufficient in getting the data you need to build and evaluate your models
You preferably have experience with cloud platforms like GCP or AWS
You care about agile software processes, data development, reliability, and focused experimentation
You have a desire to drive business impact


Where You'll Be


This role will be located in our London or Stockholm office


#JobSite-Sub-MachineLearning

Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

Title: Data Scientist - Commercial
Description:
We are looking for a Data Scientist who is passionate about leveraging data to drive commercial success in the gaming industry. In this role, you’ll focus on using analytics to identify growth opportunities, optimise game monetization strategies, and support business development initiatives. You’ll partner with game designers, product managers, and business stakeholders to unlock data-driven insights that fuel our business growth and maximise player engagement.

Example Of Responsibilities


Analyse game performance metrics and player data to identify business opportunities.
Provide insights and recommendations to optimise in-game economies, pricing models, and player engagement initiatives.
Collaborate with business development and product teams to develop data-driven monetization strategies.
Build dashboards and reports to track business performance and provide actionable insights to stakeholders.



We would love if you have


Strong background in SQL.
Experience in working with ETLs and data pipelines.
Proficiency in Python for data modelling and analysis over large datasets.
Experience in building dashboards and using tools such as Google Colab.
Ability to communicate insights and strategies to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experience or interest in games.
Professional English communication skills.



At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.

We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.

Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.

Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "Open Application."
Show more

Title: Backend Developer - ML/AI
Description:
Why VNTRS?

By joining VNTRS, you'll be part of an environment that values innovation, partnership, and shared success. We offer significant growth opportunities and the chance to be at the forefront of technological advancements in a collaborative and dynamic setting.

Our mission is to transform innovative ideas into successful companies. Unlike typical consultants, we are hands-on partners sharing both risks and successes with our clients. With a dedicated team of over 40 experts in Stockholm, Tallinn, and Helsinki, we are looking to expand our technical prowess by adding a skilled ML Backend developer to spearhead our development projects and contribute to our technological strategy.

About The Role

We are looking for a senior Backend developer with experience in Machine learning and DevOps practices.

As our ML/AI Backend Developer, you'll play a crucial role in guiding our organization through the fast-changing AI landscape. Working within our Tech Forum, you will collaborate with a dynamic group of more than 20 professionals, including full-stack developers, DevOps engineers, and architects.

Location:

Stockholm - Hybrid/on-site, not fully remote.

Key Responsibilities


Design, develop, and implement backend solutions that leverage existing ML/AI technologies to address business problems and enhance product capabilities.
Actively contribute to the VNTRS Tech Forum by sharing ML/AI insights, setting technical standards, and participating in strategic planning
Work closely with the Head of Tech to align AI initiatives with company objectives
Lead software development projects, integrating and utilizing existing ML/AI technologies.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing products and workflows
Represent VNTRS at industry events, showcasing our AI capabilities and fostering connections in the ML community



Qualifications


Minimum 5 years of professional experience within software development
Fluent in Swedish and English
Excellent problem-solving skills
Strong technical background with some knowledge in machine learning, deep learning, and AI technologies
Strong proficiency in backend development, specifically in Python (Django)
Experience with DevOps practices
Experience working with end-to-end solutions
Experience working with databases such as SQL, NoSQL or Vector DBs
Previous experience in a technical consulting role
Familiarity with big data technologies
Familiarity with cloud-based ML services such as AWS, Azure or GCP
Strong communication skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment
Ability to explain and reason ML concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders



Meritorious


Experience with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn
Familiarity with MLOps tools for model deployment and monitoring
Previous experience in a senior position within a tech startup or scaleup



Application

If you're ready to play a key role in VNTRS's tech revolution, we want to hear from you. Apply now to contribute to the future success of VNTRS and our clients.

VNTRS is a venture studio that helps entrepreneurs and large corporations to build innovative digital products and services. In some cases we invest part of our fee in exchange for equity, so-called sweat equity investments.

Our team consists of software developers, UI/UX designers, product and project managers, brand experts, and growth specialists.
Show more

Title: Data scientist
Description:
Vårt erbjudandeVi söker en data scientist till en spännande och händelserik miljö med ett viktigt uppdrag i samhället. Förutom intressanta arbetsuppgifter och kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling har vi många andra förmåner inom Försvarsmakten. En uppskattad förmån är att vi har möjlighet att träna tre timmar i veckan på arbetstid. Vi har även bra flextidsavtal, föräldralön och möjlighet att studera på arbetstid med bibehållen lön.

Avdelningen Analys och stödAnalys och stöd består av 8 medarbetare med tyngdpunkt på analys och datahantering. Avdelningen spelar en viktig roll i Försvarsmaktens attraktions- och relationsskapande verksamhet. Arbetsplatsen är resultat- och utvecklingsorienterad med en positiv framåtanda där medarbetare ständigt utvecklas.

Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifterMed data i fokus bidrar du till att utveckla och stärka Försvarsmaktens förmåga att attrahera och rekrytera personal. Du kommer främst att jobba med data i, Försvarsmaktens CRM-system/verktyg samt relaterade databaser.

Som data scientist är du en viktig spelare i vår förmåga att få fram målgruppsanpassad kommunikation där du kommer att arbeta med att identifiera och strukturera data för tolkning. Det innebär att du identifierar och strukturerar rådata från olika källor med avancerade datamodeller. I arbetet ingår också löpande uppgifter som till exempel att göra målgruppsurval till kampanjaktiviteter.

Du kommer att vara experten inom ditt område och vi ser gärna att du kan leda utvecklingen av våra datafrågor framåt och bidra till att framtidssäkra våra förmågor. Du tar fram kravställningar och testar av utveckling samt tar fram dokumentation och utbildar. I rollen kommer du att ha många olika kontaktytor i organisationen vilket gör att du behöver vara väl insatt i IT-stödet och användarnas behov.

Du kommer att ha ett nära samarbete med analytiker som analyserar, följer upp, visualiserar och tar fram insikter baserat på dina leveranser, främst i syfte att kunna vidta rätt kommunikationsåtgärder. Du kommer även att ha ett nära samarbete med datakvalitetshandläggare för att säkerställa att data är korrekt, uppdaterad och användbar.

För att lyckas i rollen behöver du ha en gedigen förståelse för databaser och dess strukturer och hur datamodeller fungerar. Du behöver också känna dig bekväm med att hitta data (från olika källor) och strukturera samt utveckla den. Om du har en förståelse för de processer som är relevanta för framgångsrika kundresor och relationshantering är det en stor fördel.

Du har en god förståelse för vad som behövs ur ett analysperspektiv i det lilla och det stora perspektivet – från att ta fram ett urval till att förstå vad som behöver utvecklas för att verksamheten ska kunna optimeras och möta framtida behov både vad gäller analyser och datautveckling. Vi söker dig som är driven, lösningsorienterad och som uppskattar att jobba i team men som också kan samarbeta och driva dialog med olika berörda funktioner som IT-förvaltningen, andra avdelningar m fl. I rollen kommer du att ha stor möjlighet att påverka både kommunikationsupplägg och arbetssätt.

Kvalifikationer är


relevant eftergymnasial utbildning
arbetslivserfarenhet i en liknande roll
erfarenhet av att hantera och strukturera data från olika typer av källor till exempel med hjälp av ETL-script
erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft Azure
erfarenhet av relationella databaser eller SQL-databaser
god förmåga att kommunicera på svenska i tal och skrift.


Personliga egenskaper

Du som söker denna roll har lätt för att ta till dig nya arbetssätt och har lätt att lära. Som person är du strukturerad med god förmåga att se samband och tänka analytiskt och strategiskt. Det är viktigt att du som söker är van vid att både arbeta självständigt och i projektform samt kan driva utvecklingen av verksamheten framåt med verksamhetsnytta i fokus. Du trivs i en organisation under förändring och utveckling. Du trivs i samarbete och har ett lösningsorienterat förhållningssätt. Du är relationsbyggande och lyhörd då du i ditt arbete kommer att arbeta med människor med olika erfarenheter och perspektiv.

Meriterande är


erfarenhet av att driva på utvecklingsarbete inom data och databaser
erfarenhet av att migrera data till Microsoft PowerBI eller annat visualiseringsverktyg
erfarenhet av arbete i ett CRM-system.


Övrigt

Anställningsort: Stockholm

Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse

Anställningsform: Tillsvidare anställning som inleds med 6 månaders provanställning

Tester kan komma att genomföras under rekryteringsprocessen.

Upplysningar om tjänsten och rekryteringsprocessen kan lämnas av

Jenny Högström, Avdelningschef, tel: 0723-868635

Fackliga representanter

SACO – Anders Kejnell

SEKO – Åsa Karlsson

Försvarsförbundet, OFRS – Kjell Tetzlaff

OFR/O – Arne Nilsson

Samtliga nås på telefon: 08-788 75 00.

Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2024-10-24

Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats. -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Försvarsmaktens HR-centrum skapar förutsättningar för Försvarsmaktens operativa förmåga och ett starkare försvar genom att säkerställa resurs- och HR-tjänster som tillgodoser förbandens behov. Läs gärna mer på https://www.forsvarsmakten.se/fmhrc Varje dag och varje timme gör Försvarsmaktens medarbetare insatser som påverkar andra människors liv, både i stort och smått, och både på hemmaplan och runt om i världen. I Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård samt bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.
Show more

Fackliga representanter

SACO – Anders Kejnell

SEKO – Åsa Karlsson

Försvarsförbundet, OFRS – Kjell Tetzlaff

OFR/O – Arne Nilsson

Samtliga nås på telefon: 08-788 75 00.

Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2024-10-24

 Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats. -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Försvarsmaktens HR-centrum skapar förutsättningar för Försvarsmaktens operativa förmåga och ett starkare försvar genom att säkerställa resurs- och HR-tjänster som tillgodoser förbandens behov. Läs gärna mer på https://www.forsvarsmakten.se/fmhrc Varje dag och varje timme gör Försvarsmaktens medarbetare insatser som påverkar andra människors liv, både i stort och smått, och både på hemmaplan och runt om i världen. I Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård samt bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

Title: Head of Data Science
Description:
Join the innovative team at Moank, a fast-growing fintech company, as their Head of Data Science. You'll lead their data-driven strategy, shaping the future of the business with cutting-edge AI technologies. If you're passionate about AI and eager to drive impactful change, this could be the opportunity for you!




Job description

Moank is an innovative financial technology company dedicated to enhancing user experiences through cutting-edge technologies. They are currently in the beginning of a bold and ambitious scale-up phase where you, as their Head of Data Science, will contribute with your expertise, building AI-powered products that make a real impact. Their team is small but highly motivated, giving you the opportunity to develop and implement new ideas and projects.




You will collaborate closely with colleagues across different functions at Moank, with the goal to design, implement, and deploy AI models that enhance Moank’s products and services.




You will for example;

Lead the Data Science team.
Design, develop, and optimise Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for various AI-driven products.
Work with embeddings and other NLP techniques to improve search and retrieval functionalities.
Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and product managers to integrate AI models into existing systems.
Experiment with and implement state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to improve model performance.
Analyse large datasets to extract meaningful patterns and insights.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP, and apply these to our projects.
Ensure the scalability, efficiency, and reliability of AI solutions within the company’s tech stack.




What Moank Offer:

A dynamic and collaborative work environment with opportunities to work on cutting-edge AI projects.
The chance to shape the future of AI-driven products within a growing company.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.




Who you are

To thrive in this position you are excellent at problem-solving and continuously curious about new ways of working and doing things. You build trust through your expertise and have the ability to listen in on your team-members before you take action. You can understand different aspects of a complex problem and have a positive mind-set with a strong willingness to get things done. We also believe that you have strong communication skills and the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.




Other requirements for this role is;

Experience in building RAG systems and working with embeddings.
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and experience with relevant frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face).
Deep understanding of natural language processing techniques, including transformers, word embeddings, and sequence-to-sequence models.
Experience with large-scale data processing and working with databases.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) is preferred.
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Science.




About the Company

Find out more about Moank and what it’s like to work with them at www.moank.se

‍

Practical info

Place of employment: Mäster Samuelsgatan in central Stockholm




Start date: ASAP, with regard to notice period




In this process Moank is working together with Winona, if you have any questions please contact Recruitment Responsible: Linda Lundgren at linda.lundgren@winonagroup.com




Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.

Title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
Description:
Vi tror att tekniken ger oss oanade möjligheter – för att utveckla människor, skapa bättre affärer och bygga hållbara samhällen. Vi letar efter dig som vet att det krävs laganda för att vinna på dagens marknad och vill skapa verklig förändring tillsammans med våra kunder genom att bygga starka team och förstå deras affärsutmaningar på djupet. Vår vision är att bli ledande inom Data & Analytics i Norden och vara förstahandsvalet för företag med affärskritiska datautmaningar. Vi är stolta över vårt Google Cloud-partnerskap och vår utmärkelse som "partner of the year", samt våra samarbeten med Microsoft och Snowflake.




Det här är Forefront

Vi – Forefront – är ett verksamhets- och IT-konsultbolag som föddes 2008. Idag är vi över 500 anställda, eller Frontiers som vi hellre kallar oss. Vi har som ambition att bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats. Det gör vi genom att uppskatta varandras olikheter, ständigt blicka framåt och skapa en organisation som är lika modig som klok. Tillsammans är vi förenade av delade visioner och drivna av större ambitioner. Med kontor och Frontiers över hela Sverige strävar vi efter att få teknik och människa att gå hand i hand.




Vem är du?

Vi söker dig som har en ingenjörsutbildning eller motsvarande inom datavetenskap, statistik eller liknande, och vill forma framtidens datahantering. Du har erfarenhet som Data Scientist eller ML Engineer och har arbetat med molnplattformar, främst GCP eller Azure. Du har programmeringskunskap i SQL och Python, och certifikat inom GCP, Azure eller AWS är meriterande. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du vara kommunikativ, initiativrik och ha en stark förmåga att kombinera teknik och affärsnytta.




Kvalifikationer

Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av:

Arbeta med publika molnplattformar, helst Google Cloud Platform (GCP) och/eller Microsoft Azure.
Arbeta med maskininlärning (ML), data science och data engineering.
Stark kompetens inom programmering, särskilt i Python och SQL.
Djup förståelse för MLOps principer.
Utmärkta kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift, samt förmåga att kommunicera tekniska koncept på ett tydligt och begripligt sätt.




Vad kan du förvänta dig?

Spännande uppgifter som Data Scientist / ML Engineer hos Forefront:

Kombinera teknisk expertis och strategiskt tänkande för att lösa affärsutmaningar.
Bygga maskininlärningsmodeller för att optimera affärsprocesser och förbättrazurea kundupplevelser.
Analysera stora mängder data för att hitta mönster och insikter som driver affärsvärde och innovation.
Säkerställa att ML-lösningar följer bästa praxis för dataintegritet, säkerhet och etik
Delta i hela utvecklingsprocessen från idé till färdig lösning
Spela en central roll i våra kunders digitala transformation




Vi lovar dig!

Sveriges härligaste kollegor.
Kompetensutveckling.
En innovativ arbetsmiljö där du får arbeta med den senaste teknologin inom AI och data.
Möjlighet att påverka och skapa värde för kunder genom att omvandla deras affärsproblem till tekniska lösningar.
Flexibelt arbete och en dynamisk företagskultur där personlig och professionell utveckling står i fokus.
Show more

Vi lovar dig!

  • Sveriges härligaste kollegor.
  • Kompetensutveckling.
  • En innovativ arbetsmiljö där du får arbeta med den senaste teknologin inom AI och data.
  • Möjlighet att påverka och skapa värde för kunder genom att omvandla deras affärsproblem till tekniska lösningar.
  • Flexibelt arbete och en dynamisk företagskultur där personlig och professionell utveckling står i fokus.

Title: Data Scientist, prediktiv modellering
Description:
Nu söker vi på Blue Lobster en Data Scientist till vår kund!

Data scientist inom prediktiv modellering har i uppdrag att skapa prediktiva modeller. I det ingår att utifrån behov och tillgängliga data identifiera möjliga modeller, välja och testa olika lösningsmodeller, samt utveckla, verifiera och produktionssätta dessa.



Vem är du?

I denna roll behöver du ha förmågan att strukturera, tvätta och hantera stora dataset, samt att du kan samarbeta och dela med dig av din kunskap till dina kollegor. Du behöver också ha god kommunikativ förmåga, både i tal och skrift, samt förmåga att presentera dina resultat. Du behärskar SQL och även har erfarenhet av Python eller likvärdigt programmeringsspråk för bearbetning av data och utveckling av modeller.

 Erfarenhet


5-8 år

Title: Data & Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Improvin'.

How would you like to make your mark? Do you want to help make the food industry more sustainable, field by field?

Improvin’ exists to tackle one of the world's largest challenges: how to producing more food, more sustainably. Our solution focuses on primary production, the source of over 70% of the food industry’s emissions. We help food brands and processors to measure, report, and reduce the climate impact of their value chains.

Our mission is both vital and urgent, demanded by consumers, legislators, and progressive food companies.

About The Role.

As a Machine Learning Engineer at Improvin’, you’ll play a key role in building a platform that helps companies in the food industry lower their climate footprints. We’re looking for someone dedicated to creating value and improving the day-to-day lives of our users. For that, you’ll need a strong belief in our mission and a passion for building data products – everything from developing and maintaining ETL flows and our data lake to working hands-on with large datasets, building machine learning models, and integrating with our web platform.

Machine learning will be increasingly used across our platform. Computer vision and remote sensing, such as field boundary and crop type detection, are already key areas and will continue to be important. Predictive models are also a major part of our future, with existing examples including yield prediction.

You'll receive competitive compensation, 30 days of paid vacation, and a pension. We’ll strive to provide all the tools necessary for you to excel and support your professional growth as our fast-scaling business evolves.

About The Team.

We use English as our working language. Our hybrid work setup is flexible, but we expect you to come into the office on a weekly basis. We accept applicants from both inside and outside the EU, and we’ll do our best to support your transition.

Most importantly, we believe that a diverse workforce is essential to our success. We are committed to creating an inclusive workplace where all employees feel valued, respected, and supported, regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, age, or disability.

How you make impact.


Develop and maintain data-focused products and machine learning models with an emphasis on performance and availability.
Design and implement scalable, reliable, and secure data processing pipelines, storage solutions, and databases.
Monitor and troubleshoot data platform issues, implementing solutions to prevent future problems.
Own and implement data security and privacy policies, including access control, encryption, and data masking
Collaborate with software engineers, analysts, designers, C-level executives, and other stakeholders to understand data needs and develop solutions.


We believe you have.


Passion and drive to build high-quality data-focused products, with proven involvement in end-to-end product development.
Approximately 5+ years of experience building scalable, reliable, and easy-to-maintain data products.
Preferably, a few years of experience in machine learning or MLOps projects.
A proactive approach to identifying pain points, risks, and opportunities in an iterative development process.
Good communication skills and a commitment to close collaboration with colleagues.
Experience contributing actively to a team’s continuous work toward a shared technical vision.
Experience with cloud-based solutions, orchestration, and containers.
A strong willingness to learn, receive feedback, and a desire to grow both personally and professionally alongside your team.


By applying, you'll have the opportunity to join a purpose-led, passionate, and international team.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Do you also believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food? Do you want to be part of a journey in an exciting industry where innovation, commitment and drive are important ingredients? Welcome to the Axfood family!

Through our group's many brands, competencies and backgrounds, we have the power to make a difference together - for real. Now we are looking for you who want to be part of developing tomorrow's grocery trade.

Become one of us

As a Data Scientist at Axfood AB you will be a part of Advanced Analytics which is a key component of our central department, Strategy & Business Development. Our team's mission is to establish Axfood as a leader in AI innovation within the grocery retail industry.

We specialize in developing and maintaining end-to-end machine learning and advanced analytics pipelines, driving Axfood to become more data driven. Our team focuses on building models for various business units, including e-commerce, loyalty programs (e.g., Willys Plus, Klubb Hemköp), digital marketing, and broader AI initiatives across the Axfood group. We collaborate closely with IT, business developers, e-commerce specialists, and business analysts within the group.

This Is What You Will Do

As a Data Scientist, you’ll develop and productionize machine learning and analytical models that support different areas of Axfood’s business. Our work includes predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering algorithms, and generative AI applications.

You will work with a team of other Data Scientists, which means there will be good opportunities to grow and learn by working together. Working on a project usually involves end-to-end responsibility which means responsibility for project design, model development, productionizing pipelines, follow-up and maintenance. Therefore, it’s important to have a good collaboration with the team and other stakeholders. This responsibility also means that there is room for creativity in project design, and ultimately that you’ll have a direct impact on Axfood’s success.

Being a Data Scientist at Axfood, you will be working with a modern, cloud-based platform to build models. You will develop models using Python and SQL for programming and mainly using AWS SageMaker and Airflow for development and orchestration of pipelines.

This Is What We Exect From You

We believe you have at least a couple of years’ experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer, with a solid foundation in AI/ML theory and hands-on experience. You also have a degree in data science, computer science, statistics, engineering, mathematics or equivalent experience.

You excel at problem-solving, cross-collaboration with other teams and stakeholders and translating business needs into data science projects that can run in production. You have a scientific mindset, appreciate the importance of sound theory and have the skills to build robust and scalable code. You strive to create tangible value with the models you build.

As a person you are an analytical and creative problem solver with strong communication and collaboration skills. You’re proficient in English, both written and spoken. Knowledge of Swedish (verbal and written) is very desirable since the working language is Swedish.

Preferred skills and experience:


Working with large data sets
Developing machine learning models (predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering etc.)
Productionizing model pipelines, from data preparation and model training to deployment and monitoring (end-to-end)
Uplift modelling (modelling individual treatment effects)
A/B testing
Proficiency in SQL and Python
Airflow (or similar) for orchestrating pipelines
Version control (Git) and CI/CD tools (Bitbucket, GitHub or Gitlab)
Working with cloud platforms such as AWS (preferred), Azure or GCP
Working with Jira


The position is a permanent employment with a start date as soon as possible or by agreement. The placement is at our headquarters, Torsplan Stockholm.

Additional Information

Do you fit the above profile? Do not hesitate to apply today! Applications are processed on a rolling basis and the position may be filled before the deadline of November 3. We only accept applications through our job pages.

If you would like to know more about what the position entails, please contact: Björn Blomqvist, Head of AI-strategy e-mail: bjorn.blomqvist@axfood.se.

To find out if we are the right fit for each other, our recruitment process includes tests and interviews.

We also conduct background checks for all recruitments. The job application process at Axfood | Axfood

Please note that during this process, we will not ask you to log in with your Bank ID, enter a password or scan a QR code. For further questions please contact our employee support at jobb@axfood.se

About Axfood

The group consists of a family of brands and is unique in the Swedish market. At Axfood, we believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food. It includes the retail chains Willys and Hemköp, as well as Tempo and Handlar'n. Wholesale sales are handled by Axfood Snabbgross and Dagab is responsible for the Group's product development, purchasing and logistics. Axfood also includes Urban Deli, as well as the partly-owned Apohem and Eurocash, City Gross and Mathem.
Show more
