As a Data Scientist at Axfood AB you will be a part of Advanced Analytics which is a key component of our central department, Strategy & Business Development. Our team's mission is to establish Axfood as a leader in AI innovation within the grocery retail industry.

We specialize in developing and maintaining end-to-end machine learning and advanced analytics pipelines, driving Axfood to become more data driven. Our team focuses on building models for various business units, including e-commerce, loyalty programs (e.g., Willys Plus, Klubb Hemköp), digital marketing, and broader AI initiatives across the Axfood group. We collaborate closely with IT, business developers, e-commerce specialists, and business analysts within the group.

This Is What You Will Do

As a Data Scientist, you’ll develop and productionize machine learning and analytical models that support different areas of Axfood’s business. Our work includes predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering algorithms, and generative AI applications.

You will work with a team of other Data Scientists, which means there will be good opportunities to grow and learn by working together. Working on a project usually involves end-to-end responsibility which means responsibility for project design, model development, productionizing pipelines, follow-up and maintenance. Therefore, it’s important to have a good collaboration with the team and other stakeholders. This responsibility also means that there is room for creativity in project design, and ultimately that you’ll have a direct impact on Axfood’s success.

Being a Data Scientist at Axfood, you will be working with a modern, cloud-based platform to build models. You will develop models using Python and SQL for programming and mainly using AWS SageMaker and Airflow for development and orchestration of pipelines.

This Is What We Exect From You

We believe you have at least a couple of years’ experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer, with a solid foundation in AI/ML theory and hands-on experience. You also have a degree in data science, computer science, statistics, engineering, mathematics or equivalent experience.

You excel at problem-solving, cross-collaboration with other teams and stakeholders and translating business needs into data science projects that can run in production. You have a scientific mindset, appreciate the importance of sound theory and have the skills to build robust and scalable code. You strive to create tangible value with the models you build.

As a person you are an analytical and creative problem solver with strong communication and collaboration skills. You’re proficient in English, both written and spoken. Knowledge of Swedish (verbal and written) is very desirable since the working language is Swedish.

Preferred skills and experience:

  • Working with large data sets
  • Developing machine learning models (predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering etc.)
  • Productionizing model pipelines, from data preparation and model training to deployment and monitoring (end-to-end)
  • Uplift modelling (modelling individual treatment effects)
  • A/B testing
  • Proficiency in SQL and Python
  • Airflow (or similar) for orchestrating pipelines
  • Version control (Git) and CI/CD tools (Bitbucket, GitHub or Gitlab)
  • Working with cloud platforms such as AWS (preferred), Azure or GCP
  • Working with Jira

The position is a permanent employment with a start date as soon as possible or by agreement. The placement is at our headquarters, Torsplan Stockholm.

Additional Information

Do you fit the above profile? Do not hesitate to apply today! Applications are processed on a rolling basis and the position may be filled before the deadline of November 3. We only accept applications through our job pages.

If you would like to know more about what the position entails, please contact: Björn Blomqvist, Head of AI-strategy e-mail: bjorn.blomqvist@axfood.se.

To find out if we are the right fit for each other, our recruitment process includes tests and interviews.

We also conduct background checks for all recruitments. The job application process at Axfood | Axfood

Please note that during this process, we will not ask you to log in with your Bank ID, enter a password or scan a QR code. For further questions please contact our employee support at jobb@axfood.se

About Axfood

The group consists of a family of brands and is unique in the Swedish market. At Axfood, we believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food. It includes the retail chains Willys and Hemköp, as well as Tempo and Handlar'n. Wholesale sales are handled by Axfood Snabbgross and Dagab is responsible for the Group's product development, purchasing and logistics. Axfood also includes Urban Deli, as well as the partly-owned Apohem and Eurocash, City Gross and Mathem.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Us

Founded in 2015, Instabox is a Sweden-based tech company with the mission to make online shopping easier. In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the merchant at heart.

We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for a Software Engineer with machine learning knowledge to help us govern our journey ahead!

About The Role

At the Route Optimization team, you’ll play a crucial role in building, maintaining, and enhancing the models and services that drive our core operations. We follow an end-to-end approach: collecting and preprocessing data, developing and validating models, deploying these models, and integrating them into our routing engine. Your work will directly impact how Instabee optimizes its routes, empowering the business to make informed strategic decisions, improve operational efficiency, and enhance customer satisfaction.

To Do This We’ll Expect You To


Build and maintain models and services and deploy them
Take the lead on developing new features and refactoring existing code, ensuring high standards of code quality and efficiency
Stay at the forefront of software development trends, experimenting with new approaches and technologies to continuously improve our systems
Work closely with algorithm engineers, machine learning engineers, and the broader tech team to share ideas and support each other in achieving our goals
Advocate for best coding practices, both within the team and across the organization, inspiring others to maintain high standards


To Succeed In This Role You Probably


Love writing high-quality production-grade code
Have 3+ years of experience as a Software Engineer or Machine Learning Engineer, working in a modern tech environment
Experience in building and deploying machine learning models
Strong programming skills in Python and Java. Experience with various databases is a plus
Familiarity with Kubernetes, Helm, Docker, and other DevOps tools
You’ve led feature development, refactoring efforts, and know how to inspire those around you


If this is you, we really can’t wait to meet you!

What You’ll Get

We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!

Benefits

Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:

🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.

🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!

🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town

🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.

👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.

💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.

🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.

⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.

👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care

and love to your little one.

🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!

Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.

This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.

Instabee was founded in 2022 after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox and Porterbuddy. Instabee is present in six countries, serving thousands of online merchants, including ASOS, Zalando, Inditex and H&M and is on track to become the most admired European e-commerce enabler.

Since the start, Instabee has focused on consumer-centric and sustainable solutions, offering deliveries to boxes and homes using muscle power, electricity, renewable diesel and biofuels. Through bespoke technical solutions, Instabee can guarantee optimal fill rates and routing, minimising any unnecessary transports. Instabee is backed by Kinnevik, Creades and EQT, among others.

Title: Senior Data Scientist - Stockholm
Description:
Who We Are

Twigeo is a Swedish-born, full-service digital marketing agency with offices in Stockholm, New York, and Varna. We deliver top-performing ads, tailored marketing strategies, and future-proof measurement to scale our clients’ business to new levels.

About The Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to become an integral part of Twigeo, contributing to the enhancement and development of our solutions in the areas of incrementality and future-proof measurement. You will not only refine and expand existing tools, but also collaborate closely on client-focused projects, such as optimizing media spend and improving efficiency to ensure the ongoing success of Twigeo’s initiatives. You are business-oriented, with a deep interest in the full process—from data science to building strong partnerships. This role offers significant potential for ownership and rapid growth. If you are passionate about leveraging data science to drive innovation and achieve impactful results, we invite you to join our dynamic team.

What You Will Do In This Role


Provide insights and guidance that allows Twigeo and clients to make better marketing decisions.
Build the cutting edge solutions in marketing measurement, then help productionize and commercialize them.
Execute comprehensive end-to-end measurement projects, helping interpret the data and serving as a strategic advisor on how to apply the findings effectively.
Use your mathematics and statistics skills to squeeze every last ounce of information from the available data.
Write and maintain code (most of our codebase is written in Python) to support advanced data analysis and model development.
Research and test relevant industry tools and products to find improvement opportunities and help Twigeo stay ahead of the curve.
Test, implement and maintain statistical and machine learning models.
Continuously manage expectations of delivery towards stakeholders and internal customers within Twigeo.
Improve and maintain Twigeo best practices for experimentation and modeling.
Explore data from all of Twigeo’s clients and data sources.


Requirements


Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field
3+ years of proven experience working with Data Science within the business industry or academia
Strong mathematics and statistics knowledge
Practical experience from working with a variety of different machine learning algorithms, with extra points for familiarity with time series modeling and Bayesian methods
Proven project management experience
Strong knowledge of and practical experience with Python or similar programming language, awareness of software engineering best practices is a plus
Mixture of strong analytical and stakeholder management skills
Fluent in English


While we consider certain technical requirements essential, we also highly value a positive attitude, self-leadership, and a strong desire for growth and development. If you believe this role is the right fit for you, we’d love to hear from you!

What we offer?


Hybrid work and flexible work hours. Our office is located in Gamla stan, Stockholm
Contribution for home office set up
30 days of vacation
Vibrant office culture and regular social events like lunches and after work
Health and wellness benefits

Title: Staff Data Scientist
Description:
Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?

Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.


Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than 400 million active users per month.
Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon and Tel Aviv with high ambitions.


As a Staff Data Scientist, you will be the right hand of the VP of Data Science and Analytics, you will take fuzzy business goals and transform them into data science products that can deliver value iteratively. Leading the data science work in the team, you will be responsible for structuring the work and ensuring that the outcomes match the business objectives. A significant part of this leadership will be coaching and mentoring other data scientists to guide and speed their development, unblocking them and finding ways to make the team as happy and productive as possible.

Collaboration is a central requirement for this role, both when working with stakeholders, but also within the team to deliver results that cannot be delivered by one person on their own

The impact you will create:


Exploring the problem space and finding data science solutions that provide step increases in customer experience
Planning data science work for the team, with an emphasis on collaboration to achieve common goals
Gathering, collating, and understanding the data necessary to create data science products that delight the customers
Collaborating with stakeholders throughout Truecaller to find and build data science products that solve business and customer problems at scale.
Coaching and mentoring junior to senior data scientists to improve their technical skills and productivity


What you bring in:


Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Science, Machine Learning, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in using data science and machine learning to solve real-world problems
A track record leading data science projects in a team, collaborating in planning, coding, and communication
Excellent programming skills in Python and SQL
Solid understanding and experience with the tooling for Python - IDEs, unit testing frameworks, and static code checks
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to present complex data and insights to non-technical stakeholders
Strong problem-solving skills and a results-oriented mindset
Customer obsession
Able to own and drive projects and products to production and iteratively improve them over time


It would be great if you also have:


Understanding how to query very large data efficiently (we use BigQuery)
Experience collaborating with C-suite executives
Experience with data from mobile applications
Experience with data visualization and reporting tools, such as Tableau, Looker, or Power BI (we use Looker)
A solid understanding of the engineering requirements necessary to put machine learning solutions into production and scale them to hundreds of millions of customers


Life at Truecaller - Behind the code: https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/

Sounds like your dream job?

We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.

This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

We only accept applications in English.

What we offer:


A smart, talented, and agile team: An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
A great compensation package: Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
Great tech tools: Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
Office life: We strongly believe in in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, now and then check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There is something for everyone!


Come as you are:

Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc. All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you

Title: Data Scientist (AI & Cloud Solutions)
Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to join our customers team and lead the end-to-end development of cutting-edge AI solutions. In this role, you will work on data pre-processing, model building, deployment, and maintenance within cloud environments like AWS and Azure.

Key Responsibilities


Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions from start to finish
Build and maintain data management systems
Work with cloud services (AWS, Azure) and big data technologies like Databricks and Spark
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver on project goals
Translate business needs into data science solutions and communicate effectively with stakeholders


What You’ll Bring


5+ years of experience with AI and data solutions
Proficiency in Python, SQL, and experience with Java or Scala
Experience with cloud services (AWS/Azure) and big data technologies
Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive approach


Qualifications


Bachelor’s/Master’s/Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Experience with end-to-end software development in cloud environments


If you're passionate about AI, cloud computing, and innovation, we'd love to hear from you!

Vi har Nordens största utbud av erfarna digitala marknadsförare

Vi hjälper kunder som vill utveckla sina digitala kanaler, har ett föränderligt kompetensbehov samt söker 100% flexibla, skalbara och kostnadseffektiva lösningar som de själva kan styra över.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Vi tror på ett samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. Att vara en del av Fortnox är att vara en del av en ständig förändring - en förändring där du själv bestämmer hur långt du vill nå. Vårt största fokus är att ge dig rätt förutsättningar att få leva din passion tillsammans med oss. Var du kommer ifrån är inte relevant - det är vart du är på väg som är intressant för oss. Precis som vi igår inte kunde drömma om det Fortnox som finns idag, så kan du vara med och forma vilka vi är imorgon.

Om tjänsten

Vi blickar mot en framtid där allt förväntas förändras, särskilt vår interaktion med den digitala världen. På Fortnox utvecklar vi nu den plattform för machine learning som kommer att bilda grund för våra framtida produkter. Med digitala "agenter" i olika former som stöttepelare, möjliggör denna teknik att vi sänker barriären för att driva företag och effektiviserar daglig administration. Arbetet är redan i full gång och vår vision är knivskarp. Du kommer att bli en central figur inom ett av våra etablerade team. För närvarande navigerar teamet genom en mängd spännande utmaningar – alltifrån verktyg och arkitektur till klassificering och generativ AI, allt kretsande kring stora språkmodeller.

Om dig

Nu söker vi dig som är Machine Learning Engineer och har flerårig erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling i produktteam. Du har en bred kompetens från klient till server och arkitektur. Genom antingen formell utbildning eller hands-on erfarenhet har du sedan rört dig mot machine learning. Du har relevant erfarenhet inom Python, ML-ramverk som Pytorch eller TensorFlow samt SQL / RDBMs och meriterande erfarenhet från Huggingface, Kubernetes, mlflow, dvc eller motsvarande verktyg.

Vidare tror vi att du bemästrar hela processen för en modell, från insamling av data till träning och optimering samt utvärdering. Du känner till de senaste teknikerna och verktygen för att skapa och implementera modeller och du är driven för att fortsätta att lära dig nya saker inom området.

För denna roll värdesätter vi djup teknisk kunskap. En del av rekryteringsprocessen involverar därför tekniska intervjuer kretsande kring machine learning, systemarkitektur, och programmeringstester i python.

Vi erbjuder

Vi erbjuder en central position inom en snabbt växande och välmående organisation. Du får stor frihet att påverka innehållet i din roll, där ditt eget bidrag kommer att ha stor inverkan på företagets resultat. Du kommer få delta i Fortnox strävan att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand.

Hos oss kommer du att få möjlighet att arbeta på spännande projekt som utmanar dina färdigheter och utvecklar din karriär. Sök nu och var med och skapa framtiden.

Om Fortnox

Fortnox AB (publ) är en företagsplattform som knyter samman människor, företag och organisationer. Vi hjälper företag starta, växa och utvecklas. Med smarta tekniska produkter, lösningar och tjänster, och möjlighet att koppla ihop dem med hundratals externa parter, är vi ett nav för företagande i Sverige. Vår vision är att skapa ett välmående samhälle format av framgångsrika företag. Fortnox grundades 2001 och har huvudkontor i Växjö samt kontor i Malmö, Linköping och Stockholm. Aktien är noterad på Nasdaq Stockholm. För ytterligare information se www.fortnox.se.

Välkommen med din ansökan!

Title: Data Scientist - LLM
Description:
Data Scientist - LLM/GenAI - Contract

We have a current opportunity for a Data Scientist with GeniAI and LLM experience on a contract basis. The position will be based in London.

If you have the relevant knowledge and experience in natural language processing and large language models, this is a true greenfield opportunity to join a team on a mission to leverage AI for the business.

Your experience and background

* Experience and proven track record in solving business problems with data science, machine learning and AI solutions

* Experience in machine learning, data analytics and AI Solutions

* Have a master's degree in statistics, mathematics, computer science or related field

* Experience working in financial crime prevention within the financial services industry is a nice to have

Please respond with an up to date CV to be considered.


Please click here to find out more about our Key Information Documents. Please note that the documents provided contain generic information. If we are successful in finding you an assignment, you will receive a Key Information Document which will be specific to the vendor set-up you have chosen and your placement.




To find out more about Huxley, please visit www.huxley.com




Huxley, a trading division of SThree Partnership LLP is acting as an Employment Business in relation to this vacancy | Registered office | 1st Floor, 75 King William Street, London, EC4N 7BE, United Kingdom | Partnership Number | OC387148 England and Wales

Title: SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST AI
Description:
Arbetsuppgifter

Är du en nyfiken och innovativ Data Scientist som vill vara med och forma framtidens AI-lösningar? Vi söker en senior Data Scientist till vår kund, där du får chansen att driva utvecklingen av Generativ AI och Maskininlärning framåt. I denna spännande roll kommer du att arbeta i framkant med den senaste tekniken, samtidigt som du bidrar till att bygga en modern och skalbar AI-plattform. Om du vill vara en del av ett team som skapar verklig affärsnytta genom AI, är detta uppdraget för dig!


Som Data Scientist i AI Service-teamet kommer du att:

Utveckla och utvärdera proof of concepts för nya AI-applikationer och ta de mest lovande lösningarna till en produktionsfärdig nivå.
Bidra till att skapa en målararkitektur för en skalbar AI-plattform i Microsoft Azure.
Samarbeta med Business Analytics-teamet för att utveckla molninfrastruktur, datarörledningar och CI/CD-processer för att hantera AI-användningsfall i stor skala.
Arbeta med att identifiera nya AI-användningsområden och hjälpa intressenter att specificera krav och behov.




Kvalifikationer
Flytande kunskaper i både engelska och svenska.
En akademisk examen inom datavetenskap, ingenjörsvetenskap, matematik eller liknande.
Erfarenhet av att tillämpa och utvärdera maskininlärningsmetoder på verkliga problem.
Förståelse för de vanligaste mönstren vid användning av stora språkmodeller (LLM).
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med data i Python.
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnleverantörer såsom Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services eller Google Cloud Platform.
Erfarenhet av databaser, datalager, data lakes eller liknande.

Meriterande

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med foundation LLMs, till exempel med OpenAI API.

Erfarenhet av AI-driven sökteknik som vektorsökning eller Azure AI Search.

Erfarenhet av webbutveckling på frontend med verktyg som Streamlit eller React.

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Docker eller liknande verktyg.

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Databricks.

Erfarenhet av CI/CD pipelines och DevOps.

Erfarenhet av SQL.

Personliga egenskaper


För att lyckas i uppdraget så ser vi gärna att du:

Har förmåga att ta huvudansvar, leda och driva uppdrag inom ditt område.

Är självständig och kan arbeta på egen hand med stort ansvarstagande.




Om oss

JobBusters är ett auktoriserat personaluthyrnings- och rekryteringsföretag som är inriktade mot tjänstemän och har funnits sen 2011. Vi på JobBusters bryr oss om våra konsulter och vårt mål är alltid att bygga långsiktiga relationer med både konsult och kund. Vårt mål är alltid att matcha våra kunders drömkandidat med våra kandidaters drömjobb!

När du blir en av oss


Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.

Lön


Enligt överenskommelse.

Tillträde och ansökan


Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start omgående och uppdraget förväntas löpa t.o.m. 2025-04-30 med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format). Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-09-20.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
At Storytel we believe that powerful stories add an extra dimension to life. Storytel is one of the world’s leading audiobook and ebook streaming services that offers unlimited listening to consumers in 25+ markets. Our vision is to make the world a more empathetic place with great stories to be shared and enjoyed by anyone, anywhere, anytime. We are now looking for a Data Scientist to join our Machine Learning team.




About the team

Storytel is looking for a Data Scientist to join our Machine Learning team within the Data Science & Engineering domain. You will work on a diverse set of high-impact projects focused on customer engagement, automated content curation and personalized recommendations. As a key member of the team, you will contribute to designing and building models that enhance how our users interact with our platform, deepening their connection to stories from around the globe. Your insights will help shape our strategies to drive engagement and optimize user experiences.




As a Data Scientist at Storytel, you will:

Join a centralized Machine Learning team within our larger Engineering organization, working on strategic initiatives to drive customer engagement and retention.
Develop and optimize end-to-end machine learning models that will have a high impact on the end user and our decision making processes.
Partner closely with the Data Engineering and MLOps teams to ensure smooth deployment, scalability and robustness of machine learning systems.
Collaborate with commercial stakeholders to navigate complex requirements, design experiments, measure model performance, and shape data-driven strategies to enhance customer engagement.
Leverage your machine learning expertise to contribute to the advancement of Storytel’s technical ecosystem, including new model development, MLOps frameworks and scalable data pipelines.
Engage in ML community meetings, journal clubs, and peer learning activities to stay at the forefront of industry trends, share insights, and strengthen the team’s collective expertise.




About you

To thrive in this role, we believe that you are a passionate individual who is knowledgeable in customer engagement models and AI technologies. You are an independent thinker who can collaborate effectively with diverse teams and communicate complex ideas clearly. Additionally, you are proactive in educating stakeholders about the value of data-driven solutions and are collaborative by nature.




You also have the following experience:

An advanced degree (MS/PhD) in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related fields-
3+ years of professional experience in data science or machine learning roles-
Significant breadth and depth of statistics/ML knowledge.
Proven experience building customer engagement models (e.g., churn prediction, customer lifetime value, and customer segmentation).
Proficiency in Python and SQL, with experience using version control systems (ex: GitHub).
Experience presenting your work to non-technical stakeholders, translating complex ideas into actionable insights.




Bonus qualifications:

Familiarity with cloud-native technologies and/or the Google Cloud Platform.
Hands-on experience with model deployment and a solid understanding of MLOps best practices.
Strong knowledge of experimental design and A/B testing methodologies.




Why you should apply

High-Impact Projects: Contribute to high-impact projects, including customer lifetime value and personalized content recommendations.
Cross-Functional Influence: Partner closely with Marketing, Engineering and Product teams to develop models that guide critical business decisions.
Shape the Future: Be a part of a mission-driven team that directly influences how people connect with stories worldwide.




What we offer

Storytel offers a friendly, entrepreneurial and fast-moving work environment where new ideas and creativity are welcomed. At Storytel we trust our employees and believe in their autonomy. We believe in doing things in new ways and questioning old methods. The Storytel culture - characterized by being welcoming and helpful - is important to us. We value individual responsibility and having people grow alongside their peers.




We offer flexible working hours, opportunities for continuous learning and development, remote working possibilities, and flexible public holidays so you can celebrate what you truly believe in.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization is approaching 100 highly skilled professionals.




Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?




The role:

As an AI Engineer, you will be part of a team that is responsible for our organization's AI-focused initiatives, unlocking the full potential of artificial intelligence to create transformative solutions for our business opportunities. With your expertise in generative AI, you and your team will lead the charge in crafting cutting-edge AI strategies and solutions. You will be pivotal in defining how we apply AI solutions to business problems. We want to deeply integrate AI across our organization, drive innovation and ensure that AI is a clear part of our business strategy.




You will be reporting to our CTO and Head of AI Product.




Who You Are:

You are an experienced and driven software engineer who has been part of the generative AI wave, and both experimented with and shipped applications to real users. Complex challenges do not deter you; they intrigue you. You tackle them methodically, finding practical solutions that truly make a difference.




You prefer working in a team with developers, designers and product managers and deeply collaborate with your team rather than working from specifications. You communicate effectively and can discuss the pros and cons of different options in constructive ways.

As the AI field is moving forward at enormous speed, you are constantly following tech news for interesting developments that you can use to solve business problems.




Responsibilities

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, and product managers, to define requirements and deliver AI solutions that meet business needs.
Stay up to date with the latest developments in generative AI, actively following open-source projects and explore innovative AI technologies that can benefit the organization.
Create prototypes and proof-of-concepts to demonstrate the feasibility and potential of AI solutions to stakeholders.
Continuously optimize AI models and algorithms for efficiency and scalability.
Document architecture designs, algorithms, and best practices for knowledge sharing within the organization.
Provide guidance and mentorship to AI ambassadors in the organization, fostering their growth, development, and contribution to AI use in their respective departments.




Qualifications

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
Proven experience with generative AI.
Please provide sources to your work in your application - You will be asked to demo your experience in the interview process
Interest in both open-source AI frameworks, libraries as well as closed-source projects, having contributed is a strong plus.
Proficiency in machine learning techniques, frameworks, big data, and programming languages.
Proficiency in Swedish




What we offer

Hybrid/remote work environment - you will be part of a team based in and around Stockholm that values collaboration and communication, regardless of location.
Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools, we sign agreements with the largest players, and we encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work to form a collaborative environment where AI is used throughout the group.
Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.




Location

We find great value in being able to work closely with our Stockholm-based team in person. At the same time, we understand the need to focus deeply without interruptions. Therefore, the team works according to a hybrid setup with 3 days at the Stockholm office, and 2 days remotely from home, combining the best of both worlds.




Excited?

If you are excited about being part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position.

Show more
HTML:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization is approaching 100 highly skilled professionals.


Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?


The role:

As an AI Engineer, you will be part of a team that is responsible for our organization's AI-focused initiatives, unlocking the full potential of artificial intelligence to create transformative solutions for our business opportunities. With your expertise in generative AI, you and your team will lead the charge in crafting cutting-edge AI strategies and solutions. You will be pivotal in defining how we apply AI solutions to business problems. We want to deeply integrate AI across our organization, drive innovation and ensure that AI is a clear part of our business strategy.


You will be reporting to our CTO and Head of AI Product.


Who You Are:

You are an experienced and driven software engineer who has been part of the generative AI wave, and both experimented with and shipped applications to real users. Complex challenges do not deter you; they intrigue you. You tackle them methodically, finding practical solutions that truly make a difference.


You prefer working in a team with developers, designers and product managers and deeply collaborate with your team rather than working from specifications. You communicate effectively and can discuss the pros and cons of different options in constructive ways.

As the AI field is moving forward at enormous speed, you are constantly following tech news for interesting developments that you can use to solve business problems.


Responsibilities

  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, and product managers, to define requirements and deliver AI solutions that meet business needs.
  • Stay up to date with the latest developments in generative AI, actively following open-source projects and explore innovative AI technologies that can benefit the organization.
  • Create prototypes and proof-of-concepts to demonstrate the feasibility and potential of AI solutions to stakeholders.
  • Continuously optimize AI models and algorithms for efficiency and scalability.
  • Document architecture designs, algorithms, and best practices for knowledge sharing within the organization.
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to AI ambassadors in the organization, fostering their growth, development, and contribution to AI use in their respective departments.


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
  • Proven experience with generative AI.
  • Please provide sources to your work in your application - You will be asked to demo your experience in the interview process
  • Interest in both open-source AI frameworks, libraries as well as closed-source projects, having contributed is a strong plus.
  • Proficiency in machine learning techniques, frameworks, big data, and programming languages.
  • Proficiency in Swedish


What we offer

  • Hybrid/remote work environment - you will be part of a team based in and around Stockholm that values collaboration and communication, regardless of location.
  • Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
  • Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools, we sign agreements with the largest players, and we encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work to form a collaborative environment where AI is used throughout the group.
  • Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
  • Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.


Location

We find great value in being able to work closely with our Stockholm-based team in person. At the same time, we understand the need to focus deeply without interruptions. Therefore, the team works according to a hybrid setup with 3 days at the Stockholm office, and 2 days remotely from home, combining the best of both worlds.


Excited?

If you are excited about being part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer - Contract - Stockholm
Description:
Job Description

For our client we are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer.

The primary tasks for a Machine Learning Engineer in MLE area are:

Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usage and scale out to the comprehensive fashion network of the companyDesign, develop and maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, A/B test, etc.Work in cross-functional agile team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, business stakeholders to build the AI ecosystem within the company.

Required Skills And Experiences

Have a BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.Have 4+ years’ professional experience working in relevant role(s) for a Machine Learning Engineer.A hands-on person who loves coding, and like applying software engineering practices to machine learning projects.Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production.Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 3+ years.

Have great experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud.Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, and deploying ML applications to production.Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.Have experience handling high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream) and a solid understanding of data structures, databases, and data storage technologies.Familiar with agile ways of working team collaboration, data-driven development, reliable and responsible experimentation.

Required cloud certification: Azure or GCP

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
AI Engineer på Kundo – Driv framtiden för AI inom kundservice

Vill du vara med och driva AI- och teknik-transformationen inom kundservice?

Kundo är ett SaaS-bolag som erbjuder Sveriges mest okrångliga kundservicesystem. Vi arbetar hårt mot målet att bli Nordens ledande helhetsleverantör av digitala kundservice-produkter. Kundservicebranschen förändras snabbt, och framväxande AI-teknologier ger stora möjligheter till effektivisering och innovation. Vi står inför en spännande och ambitiös resa där vi bygger en plattform som driver AI-baserad förändring.




På vår fortsatta tillväxtresa letar vi nu efter en skicklig och visionär AI Engineer som ansluter till vårt fantastiska utvecklingsteam. I denna roll får du en unik möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste AI-tekniken och driva innovation i en föränderlig bransch där kundservice håller på att transformeras helt och hållet.




Rollbeskrivning

Som AI Engineer på Kundo kommer du att ingå i ett tvärfunktionellt team där fokus kommer att vara att utveckla och implementera AI-drivna funktioner för vår produkt.

Du arbetar både med att förbättra och utveckla produktens effektivitet och användarupplevelse genom att införa AI som en naturlig del i hela vår produktlösning, och att utveckla hela bolagets produktstrategi och -erbjudande baserat på AI.

Du kommer att arbeta nära våra UX-designers, produktchefer och andra teammedlemmar, där du leder processen från att identifiera kundbehov till att välja rätt AI-lösning, implementera och optimera dessa, samt mäta effekten av dem.




Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden

Designa, utveckla och underhålla AI-baserade system med hjälp av den senaste tekniken, såsom stora språkmodeller (LLM), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), AI-agenter och AI-pipelines.
Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att säkerställa att AI-lösningar är i linje med kundernas behov och verksamhetsmål.
Bidra till att forma Kundos långsiktiga AI-strategi och utveckling.




Vad vi söker

För att trivas i denna roll har du troligtvis följande kvalifikationer:

Minst 5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling
Goda kunskaper i Python
Minst 2 års Erfarenhet av att arbeta med modern AI-teknik som stora språkmodeller, AI-pipelines och agenter.
Ett starkt intresse för AI-innovation och erfarenhet av att designa och implementera AI-lösningar.
Meriterande är erfarenhet av data engineering.




Har du några frågor? Hör gärna av dig till Jonatan Larsson på 070-5124424 eller jonatan@kundo.se. Vi hanterar själva rekryteringsprocessen internt och tar inte hjälp av externa partners.

Show more

Title: Data Scientist- GenAI
Description:
Do you also believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food? Do you want to be part of a journey in an exciting industry where innovation, commitment and drive are important ingredients? Welcome to the Axfood family!

Through our group's many brands, competencies and backgrounds, we have the power to make a difference together - for real. Now we are looking for you who want to be part of developing tomorrow's grocery trade.

Become one of us

As a Data Scientist at Axfood AB you will be a part of Advanced Analytics which is a key component of our central department, Strategy & Business Development. Our team's mission is to establish Axfood as a leader in AI innovation within the grocery retail industry.

We specialize in developing and maintaining end-to-end machine learning and advanced analytics pipelines, driving Axfood to become more data driven. Our team focuses on building models for various business units, including e-commerce, loyalty programs (e.g., Willys Plus, Klubb Hemköp), digital marketing, and broader AI initiatives across the Axfood group. We collaborate closely with IT, business developers, e-commerce specialists, and business analysts within the group.

This Is What You Will Do

As a Data Scientist, you’ll develop and productionize machine learning and analytical models that support different areas of Axfood’s business. The team you will be a part of work on predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering algorithms and building AI solutions. In this role, you will focus on developing GenAI solutions to transform how we engage customers and deliver value across different areas of our business.

You will work with a team of other Data Scientists, which means there will be good opportunities to grow and learn by working together. Working on a project usually involves end-to-end responsibility which means responsibility for project design, model development, productionizing pipelines, follow-up and maintenance. Therefore, it’s important to have a good collaboration with the team and other stakeholders. This responsibility also means that there is room for creativity in project design, and ultimately that you’ll have a direct impact on Axfood’s success.

Being a Data Scientist at Axfood, you will be working with a modern, cloud-based platform to build models. You will develop models using Python and SQL for programming and mainly using AWS SageMaker and Airflow for development and orchestration of pipelines.

This Is What We Expect From You

To excel in this role you need to have at least a couple years of experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer and have deep knowledge in machine learning/AI. We see that you have a degree in mathematics, computer science, physics, statistics, data science or equivalent engineering degree.

You have deep knowledge in advanced modelling with different types of AI models - both traditional and generative - and a great interest in MLOps and building scalable code. We would also like to see that you have worked in projects building and delivering applications with generative AI and that you are excited about exploring new concepts in the world of data science and AI.

As a person you are an analytical and creative problem solver with strong communication and collaboration skills. You’re proficient in English, both written and spoken. Knowledge of Swedish (verbal and written) is very desirable since the working language is Swedish.

Preferred skills and experience:


Experience developing end-to-end machine learning solutions – from data preparation and model training to deployment and monitoring
Experience with generative AI applications
Proficiency in Python and SQL
Working with large data sets
Airflow (or similar) for orchestrating pipelines
Version control (Git) and CI/CD tools (Bitbucket, GitHub or Gitlab)
Working with cloud platforms such as AWS (preferred), Azure or GCP


The position is a permanent employment with a start date as soon as possible or by agreement. The placement is at our headquarters, Torsplan Stockholm.

Additional Information

Do you fit the above profile? Do not hesitate to apply today! Applications are processed on a rolling basis and the position may be filled before the deadline of November 3. We only accept applications through our job pages.

If you would like to know more about what the position entails, please contact: Björn Blomqvist, Head of AI-strategy, e-mail: bjorn.blomqvist@axfood.se.

To find out if we are the right fit for each other, our recruitment process includes tests and interviews.

We also conduct background checks for all recruitments.The job application process at Axfood | Axfood

Please note that during this process, we will not ask you to log in with your Bank ID, enter a password or scan a QR code. For further questions please contact our employee support at jobb@axfood.se

About Axfood

The group consists of a family of brands and is unique in the Swedish market. At Axfood, we believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food. It includes the retail chains Willys and Hemköp, as well as Tempo and Handlar'n. Wholesale sales are handled by Axfood Snabbgross and Dagab is responsible for the Group's product development, purchasing and logistics. Axfood also includes Urban Deli, as well as the partly-owned Apohem and Eurocash, City Gross and Mathem.

Title: Data Scientist - Commercial
Description:
We are looking for a Data Scientist who is passionate about leveraging data to drive commercial success in the gaming industry. In this role, you’ll focus on using analytics to identify growth opportunities, optimise game monetization strategies, and support business development initiatives. You’ll partner with game designers, product managers, and business stakeholders to unlock data-driven insights that fuel our business growth and maximise player engagement.

Example Of Responsibilities


Analyse game performance metrics and player data to identify business opportunities.
Provide insights and recommendations to optimise in-game economies, pricing models, and player engagement initiatives.
Collaborate with business development and product teams to develop data-driven monetization strategies.
Build dashboards and reports to track business performance and provide actionable insights to stakeholders.



We would love if you have


Strong background in SQL.
Experience in working with ETLs and data pipelines.
Proficiency in Python for data modelling and analysis over large datasets.
Experience in building dashboards and using tools such as Google Colab.
Ability to communicate insights and strategies to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experience or interest in games.
Professional English communication skills.



At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.

We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.

Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.

Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "Open Application."

Title: Senior Data Scientist - Stockholm
Description:
Who We Are

Twigeo is a Swedish-born, full-service digital marketing agency with offices in Stockholm, New York, and Varna. We deliver top-performing ads, tailored marketing strategies, and future-proof measurement to scale our clients’ business to new levels.

About The Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to become an integral part of Twigeo, contributing to the enhancement and development of our solutions in the areas of incrementality and future-proof measurement. You will not only refine and expand existing tools, but also collaborate closely on client-focused projects, such as optimizing media spend and improving efficiency to ensure the ongoing success of Twigeo’s initiatives. You are business-oriented, with a deep interest in the full process—from data science to building strong partnerships. This role offers significant potential for ownership and rapid growth. If you are passionate about leveraging data science to drive innovation and achieve impactful results, we invite you to join our dynamic team.

What You Will Do In This Role


Provide insights and guidance that allows Twigeo and clients to make better marketing decisions.
Build the cutting edge solutions in marketing measurement, then help productionize and commercialize them.
Execute comprehensive end-to-end measurement projects, helping interpret the data and serving as a strategic advisor on how to apply the findings effectively.
Use your mathematics and statistics skills to squeeze every last ounce of information from the available data.
Write and maintain code (most of our codebase is written in Python) to support advanced data analysis and model development.
Research and test relevant industry tools and products to find improvement opportunities and help Twigeo stay ahead of the curve.
Test, implement and maintain statistical and machine learning models.
Continuously manage expectations of delivery towards stakeholders and internal customers within Twigeo.
Improve and maintain Twigeo best practices for experimentation and modeling.
Explore data from all of Twigeo’s clients and data sources.


Requirements


Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field
3+ years of proven experience working with Data Science within the business industry or academia
Strong mathematics and statistics knowledge
Practical experience from working with a variety of different machine learning algorithms, with extra points for familiarity with time series modeling and Bayesian methods
Proven project management experience
Strong knowledge of and practical experience with Python or similar programming language, awareness of software engineering best practices is a plus
Mixture of strong analytical and stakeholder management skills
Fluent in English


While we consider certain technical requirements essential, we also highly value a positive attitude, self-leadership, and a strong desire for growth and development. If you believe this role is the right fit for you, we’d love to hear from you!

What we offer?


Hybrid work and flexible work hours. Our office is located in Gamla stan, Stockholm
Contribution for home office set up
30 days of vacation
Vibrant office culture and regular social events like lunches and after work
Health and wellness benefits
Show more
HTML:
Who We Are

Twigeo is a Swedish-born, full-service digital marketing agency with offices in Stockholm, New York, and Varna. We deliver top-performing ads, tailored marketing strategies, and future-proof measurement to scale our clients’ business to new levels.

About The Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to become an integral part of Twigeo, contributing to the enhancement and development of our solutions in the areas of incrementality and future-proof measurement. You will not only refine and expand existing tools, but also collaborate closely on client-focused projects, such as optimizing media spend and improving efficiency to ensure the ongoing success of Twigeo’s initiatives. You are business-oriented, with a deep interest in the full process—from data science to building strong partnerships. This role offers significant potential for ownership and rapid growth. If you are passionate about leveraging data science to drive innovation and achieve impactful results, we invite you to join our dynamic team.

What You Will Do In This Role

  • Provide insights and guidance that allows Twigeo and clients to make better marketing decisions.
  • Build the cutting edge solutions in marketing measurement, then help productionize and commercialize them.
  • Execute comprehensive end-to-end measurement projects, helping interpret the data and serving as a strategic advisor on how to apply the findings effectively.
  • Use your mathematics and statistics skills to squeeze every last ounce of information from the available data.
  • Write and maintain code (most of our codebase is written in Python) to support advanced data analysis and model development.
  • Research and test relevant industry tools and products to find improvement opportunities and help Twigeo stay ahead of the curve.
  • Test, implement and maintain statistical and machine learning models.
  • Continuously manage expectations of delivery towards stakeholders and internal customers within Twigeo.
  • Improve and maintain Twigeo best practices for experimentation and modeling.
  • Explore data from all of Twigeo’s clients and data sources.

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field
  • 3+ years of proven experience working with Data Science within the business industry or academia
  • Strong mathematics and statistics knowledge
  • Practical experience from working with a variety of different machine learning algorithms, with extra points for familiarity with time series modeling and Bayesian methods
  • Proven project management experience
  • Strong knowledge of and practical experience with Python or similar programming language, awareness of software engineering best practices is a plus
  • Mixture of strong analytical and stakeholder management skills
  • Fluent in English

While we consider certain technical requirements essential, we also highly value a positive attitude, self-leadership, and a strong desire for growth and development. If you believe this role is the right fit for you, we’d love to hear from you!

What we offer?

  • Hybrid work and flexible work hours. Our office is located in Gamla stan, Stockholm
  • Contribution for home office set up
  • 30 days of vacation
  • Vibrant office culture and regular social events like lunches and after work
  • Health and wellness benefits

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Us

Founded in 2015, Instabox is a Sweden-based tech company with the mission to make online shopping easier. In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the merchant at heart.

We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for a Software Engineer with machine learning knowledge to help us govern our journey ahead!

About The Role

At the Route Optimization team, you’ll play a crucial role in building, maintaining, and enhancing the models and services that drive our core operations. We follow an end-to-end approach: collecting and preprocessing data, developing and validating models, deploying these models, and integrating them into our routing engine. Your work will directly impact how Instabee optimizes its routes, empowering the business to make informed strategic decisions, improve operational efficiency, and enhance customer satisfaction.

To Do This We’ll Expect You To


Build and maintain models and services and deploy them
Take the lead on developing new features and refactoring existing code, ensuring high standards of code quality and efficiency
Stay at the forefront of software development trends, experimenting with new approaches and technologies to continuously improve our systems
Work closely with algorithm engineers, machine learning engineers, and the broader tech team to share ideas and support each other in achieving our goals
Advocate for best coding practices, both within the team and across the organization, inspiring others to maintain high standards


To Succeed In This Role You Probably


Love writing high-quality production-grade code
Have 3+ years of experience as a Software Engineer or Machine Learning Engineer, working in a modern tech environment
Experience in building and deploying machine learning models
Strong programming skills in Python and Java. Experience with various databases is a plus
Familiarity with Kubernetes, Helm, Docker, and other DevOps tools
You’ve led feature development, refactoring efforts, and know how to inspire those around you


If this is you, we really can’t wait to meet you!

What You’ll Get

We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!

Benefits

Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:

🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.

🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!

🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town

🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.

👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.

💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.

🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.

⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.

👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care

and love to your little one.

🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!

Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.

This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.

Instabee was founded in 2022 after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox and Porterbuddy. Instabee is present in six countries, serving thousands of online merchants, including ASOS, Zalando, Inditex and H&M and is on track to become the most admired European e-commerce enabler.

Since the start, Instabee has focused on consumer-centric and sustainable solutions, offering deliveries to boxes and homes using muscle power, electricity, renewable diesel and biofuels. Through bespoke technical solutions, Instabee can guarantee optimal fill rates and routing, minimising any unnecessary transports. Instabee is backed by Kinnevik, Creades and EQT, among others.

Title: Data & Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
About Improvin'.

How would you like to make your mark? Do you want to help make the food industry more sustainable, field by field?

Improvin’ exists to tackle one of the world's largest challenges: how to producing more food, more sustainably. Our solution focuses on primary production, the source of over 70% of the food industry’s emissions. We help food brands and processors to measure, report, and reduce the climate impact of their value chains.

Our mission is both vital and urgent, demanded by consumers, legislators, and progressive food companies.

About The Role.

As a Machine Learning Engineer at Improvin’, you’ll play a key role in building a platform that helps companies in the food industry lower their climate footprints. We’re looking for someone dedicated to creating value and improving the day-to-day lives of our users. For that, you’ll need a strong belief in our mission and a passion for building data products – everything from developing and maintaining ETL flows and our data lake to working hands-on with large datasets, building machine learning models, and integrating with our web platform.

Machine learning will be increasingly used across our platform. Computer vision and remote sensing, such as field boundary and crop type detection, are already key areas and will continue to be important. Predictive models are also a major part of our future, with existing examples including yield prediction.

You'll receive competitive compensation, 30 days of paid vacation, and a pension. We’ll strive to provide all the tools necessary for you to excel and support your professional growth as our fast-scaling business evolves.

About The Team.

We use English as our working language. Our hybrid work setup is flexible, but we expect you to come into the office on a weekly basis. We accept applicants from both inside and outside the EU, and we’ll do our best to support your transition.

Most importantly, we believe that a diverse workforce is essential to our success. We are committed to creating an inclusive workplace where all employees feel valued, respected, and supported, regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, age, or disability.

How you make impact.


Develop and maintain data-focused products and machine learning models with an emphasis on performance and availability.
Design and implement scalable, reliable, and secure data processing pipelines, storage solutions, and databases.
Monitor and troubleshoot data platform issues, implementing solutions to prevent future problems.
Own and implement data security and privacy policies, including access control, encryption, and data masking
Collaborate with software engineers, analysts, designers, C-level executives, and other stakeholders to understand data needs and develop solutions.


We believe you have.


Passion and drive to build high-quality data-focused products, with proven involvement in end-to-end product development.
Approximately 5+ years of experience building scalable, reliable, and easy-to-maintain data products.
Preferably, a few years of experience in machine learning or MLOps projects.
A proactive approach to identifying pain points, risks, and opportunities in an iterative development process.
Good communication skills and a commitment to close collaboration with colleagues.
Experience contributing actively to a team’s continuous work toward a shared technical vision.
Experience with cloud-based solutions, orchestration, and containers.
A strong willingness to learn, receive feedback, and a desire to grow both personally and professionally alongside your team.


By applying, you'll have the opportunity to join a purpose-led, passionate, and international team.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist - LLM
Description:
Data Scientist - LLM/GenAI - Contract

We have a current opportunity for a Data Scientist with GeniAI and LLM experience on a contract basis. The position will be based in London.

If you have the relevant knowledge and experience in natural language processing and large language models, this is a true greenfield opportunity to join a team on a mission to leverage AI for the business.

Your experience and background

* Experience and proven track record in solving business problems with data science, machine learning and AI solutions

* Experience in machine learning, data analytics and AI Solutions

* Have a master's degree in statistics, mathematics, computer science or related field

* Experience working in financial crime prevention within the financial services industry is a nice to have

Please respond with an up to date CV to be considered.


Please click here to find out more about our Key Information Documents. Please note that the documents provided contain generic information. If we are successful in finding you an assignment, you will receive a Key Information Document which will be specific to the vendor set-up you have chosen and your placement.

Title: SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST AI
Description:
Arbetsuppgifter

Är du en nyfiken och innovativ Data Scientist som vill vara med och forma framtidens AI-lösningar? Vi söker en senior Data Scientist till vår kund, där du får chansen att driva utvecklingen av Generativ AI och Maskininlärning framåt. I denna spännande roll kommer du att arbeta i framkant med den senaste tekniken, samtidigt som du bidrar till att bygga en modern och skalbar AI-plattform. Om du vill vara en del av ett team som skapar verklig affärsnytta genom AI, är detta uppdraget för dig!


Som Data Scientist i AI Service-teamet kommer du att:

Utveckla och utvärdera proof of concepts för nya AI-applikationer och ta de mest lovande lösningarna till en produktionsfärdig nivå.
Bidra till att skapa en målararkitektur för en skalbar AI-plattform i Microsoft Azure.
Samarbeta med Business Analytics-teamet för att utveckla molninfrastruktur, datarörledningar och CI/CD-processer för att hantera AI-användningsfall i stor skala.
Arbeta med att identifiera nya AI-användningsområden och hjälpa intressenter att specificera krav och behov.




Kvalifikationer
Flytande kunskaper i både engelska och svenska.
En akademisk examen inom datavetenskap, ingenjörsvetenskap, matematik eller liknande.
Erfarenhet av att tillämpa och utvärdera maskininlärningsmetoder på verkliga problem.
Förståelse för de vanligaste mönstren vid användning av stora språkmodeller (LLM).
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med data i Python.
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnleverantörer såsom Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services eller Google Cloud Platform.
Erfarenhet av databaser, datalager, data lakes eller liknande.

Meriterande

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med foundation LLMs, till exempel med OpenAI API.

Erfarenhet av AI-driven sökteknik som vektorsökning eller Azure AI Search.

Erfarenhet av webbutveckling på frontend med verktyg som Streamlit eller React.

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Docker eller liknande verktyg.

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Databricks.

Erfarenhet av CI/CD pipelines och DevOps.

Erfarenhet av SQL.

Personliga egenskaper


För att lyckas i uppdraget så ser vi gärna att du:

Har förmåga att ta huvudansvar, leda och driva uppdrag inom ditt område.

Är självständig och kan arbeta på egen hand med stort ansvarstagande.




Om oss

JobBusters är ett auktoriserat personaluthyrnings- och rekryteringsföretag som är inriktade mot tjänstemän och har funnits sen 2011. Vi på JobBusters bryr oss om våra konsulter och vårt mål är alltid att bygga långsiktiga relationer med både konsult och kund. Vårt mål är alltid att matcha våra kunders drömkandidat med våra kandidaters drömjobb!

När du blir en av oss


Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.

Lön


Enligt överenskommelse.

Tillträde och ansökan


Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start omgående och uppdraget förväntas löpa t.o.m. 2025-04-30 med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format). Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-09-20.













Show more
